titleStmt.title: A true tale of Robbin, or, [A] briefe touch of the life and death o[f that r]enowned outlaw, Robert Earle of Huntin[gton vu]lgarly called Robbin Hood who lived and died in [1]198. being the 9. yeare of the reigne of King Ri[chard] the First, commonly called Richard Cuer de Lyou [sic] / [ca]refully collected out of the truest writers of our English c[hronicl]les, and published for the satisfaction of those who desire to [have?] truth purged from falsehood, by Martin Parker.
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

publicationStmt.publisher: For T. Cotes, and are to be sold b [sic] F. Groves ...,

notesStmt.note: Imprint cropped; date of imprint suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: Cropped and tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
